page.title: 09COMMUNITY EDUCATION TRUST
page.content: The Community Education Trust is an organisation which started an anti- racist course in Islington amongst many third years in Islington schools.Opel Christie (co-ordinator) visted schools telling third years about the years course.We now meet regulary and discuss the problems of racism.The years course included a three week trip to Barbados for three winners of an anti-racist essay competition.I was one of the lucky three. In July we flew out from Heathrow and spent three weeks staying with families.We were taken round the island visiting schools and many other places of interest to help give us an idea of their way of life.As well as being an enjoyable experience it certainly help me to understand other peoples'views and problems.
